name: angular-xhr-src
tagline: Request IMG src and LINK href via XHR and serve as Blob URL.  Useful for apps running under Content Security Policy (CSP).
body: # angular-xhr-src Request IMG src and LINK href via XHR and serve as Blob URL. Useful for apps running under Content Security Policy (CSP) such as Chrome Apps. Uses [this approach: Referencing External Content](https://developer.chrome.com/apps/app_external#external). ## Usage ``` // dependency on xhrSrc angular.module('myApp', ['xhrSrc']) ``` ``` ``` ``` ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
